name: PureWow
overview:
What is PureWow?

PureWow is the free daily email and website for stylish women of substance, featuring the very best in culture, fashion, travel, tech & so much more!

Everyday we put one irresistible recommendation on your radar. We cover a wide range of timely subjects including culture, fashion, tech, travel, beauty, home, health and giving and we tell you about them first. Each weekday you’ll receive an email spotlighting something exciting that our team has found with you and your interests specifically in mind. And if you’re looking for one of our past emails, they’re all archived on our companion website.

We do the editing for you…

We know you’re resourceful, intelligent and completely overcommitted. So we promise not to waste your time, just to send you an email every weekday with one absolute essential. Our in-the-know team is constantly sifting through everything out there, looking for just the most relevant and unique new items, indulgences, and experiences for you. We’re that savvy friend who always knows about a new novel you can’t put down, the stylish hotel that just opened, the best iPhone app, a just-launching charity that’s already changing lives, the most effective moisturizer, and where to find a pair of jeans that really fits.

PureWow: National, New York, LA, Chicago & Recipes

We launched PureWow with a national focus, and now have local editions covering the best in New York City, Los Angeles, Chicago and Dallas too, with more editions dedicated to specific cities coming down the road. We promise to keep you posted. We also have a twice-weekly Recipes edition we know you’ll love, and a once-weekly Books edition coming soon!
